## About Me ðŸš€

- ðŸ“« I'm currently looking for Software Engineer, Full Stack Engineer and Systems Engineer jobs.
- ðŸŒ± Previously worked as a Software Engineer at Oracle and Senior Data Engineer at LTIMindtree. 
- ðŸ‘¯ Iâ€™m looking to collaborate on Full Stack and Distributed Systems Projects.
- ðŸ’¬ I have strong fundamentals in Algorithms, Distributed Systems and Cloud Computing.


I am a dedicated Software Developer with a passion for exploring new technological domains. Currently the creator of Axon, an innovative app designed to enhance student connectivity through carpooling and networking. I love finding solutions to repetitive tasks through automation, which led me to develop automated workflows for business processes and an automated grading system. Actively involved in women in tech organizations, I am committed to promoting diversity in the industry. With a strong background in Full Stack Development, Distributed Systems and Machine Learning, I strive to create impactful large-scale products, develop innovative automation solutions, and address real-world challenges.
